definition: to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale

sentences.english: If any turn back after this, they are perverted transgressors.
sentences.chinese: 此後，凡背棄約言的，都是罪人。

sentences.english: In this way I shall know that thou hast kept faith with my master .
sentences.chinese: 這樣，我就會知道你信守和我的主人的約言了。
